options.label: fig-statistical-process-statistical-process
options.fig.alt: Series of blobs forming a cycle, representing information coming from the population to the sample and back to the population.

options.label: tbl-statistical-process-tidy-data
options.tbl-cap: Example of storying data according to "tidy data" principles.  Data is from a hypothetical study.

options.label: tbl-statistical-process-data-summary
options.tbl-cap: Summary of patient characteristics from our hypothetical study.

options.label: fig-statistical-process-graphics
options.fig.cap: Two graphical presentations of data from a hypothetical study, adhering to good graphical practices.
options.fig.alt: Bar chart summarizing distribution of the number of miscarriages next to a set of side-by-side boxplots with raw data overlaid showing the distribution of the patients age across treatment groups.

options.label: fig-statistical-process-poor-graphics
options.fig.cap: Inappropriate graphical presentation from a hypothetical study as it ignores a sense of variability in the data.
options.fig.alt: Bars used to represent the mean age in different groups.
